name: Versille Tour - Demo
description:
This is an exploratory visual novel style game where you can tour the small town of Versille, meet its residents, and get involved in their lives.

The 1.0 demo includes:

Four locations in town to explore (plus the ending location)

Five characters you can meet

A few unlockable menu options you can explore.

More events and options will be added in future versions, including more locations, more characters, and more activities to participate in.

Royalty free music for the demo is provided by http://www.bensound.com/ via Creative Commons: https://creativecommons.org/li... .

Art and coding is done by me (Hikari Yuushi).

Ren'Py is what was used to create the game.
